DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate cost outcome Arthritis Foundation aquatic exercise class . - DESIGN . Randomized trial 20-week aquatic class . - SUBJECTS AND METHODS . Recruited 249 adult Washington State age 55 75 doctor-confirmed diagnosis osteoarthritis - MEAURES . The Quality Well-Being Scale ( QWB ) , Current Health Desirability Rating ( CHDR ) , Health Assessment Questionnaire ( HAQ ) , Center Epidemiologic Studies-Depression Scale ( CES-D ) , Perceived Quality Life Scale ( PQOL )
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Cost-Efficiency Aquatic Exercise Management Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Clinically confirm diagnosis osteoarthritis physician Aged 55 75 Not currently exercise , define engaging average less 60 minute exercise/week last month Permission subject 's primary physician participate aquatic class Not currently enrol another medical study Not schedule joint replacement surgery study period Living area Arthritis Foundation aquatic program offer Willingness randomize commit 5month study period
